title: Poster, "A New Wave of Japanese Architecture", 1978
inscribed: Imprinted in red ink across recto: A NEW WAVE OF JAPANESE ARCHITECTURE; imprinted in white across upper margin:The Institute for Architecture and Urban Studies/...;in red ink at UL: IAUS National Architecture exchange; at UC: September 25, 1978 to November 14, 1978 Five Japanese Architects on Tour to Ten American Cities; followed by information pertaining to participating architects, cities toured,lectures, sponsors,...; in whiteat lower margin: Design Vignelli Associates
dimensions:
Custom Frame H x W x D: 121.9 x 63.5 cm (48 x 25 in.)
H x W x D: 57.1 x 57.1cm (22 1/2 x 22 1/2in.)

Poster, "A New Wave of Japanese Architecture", 1978.offset lithograph
Support: paper. 1991-69-82.
